ARTICLE.TITLE: Kim Kardashian splashes out on lavish fireworks display for North's seventh birthday
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Kim Kardashian pulled out all the stops for her eldest daughter North West on her seventh birthday.

The 39-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star took to Instagram to share a series of surprise snaps and videos of the family celebration at their Wyoming ranch last night.

Proud mother-of-four Kim, who also shares children Saint, four, Chicago, two, Psalm, one, with husband Kanye West, threw a lavish party for her daughter North.

North's special day was topped off with a stunning fireworks display which Kim captured on camera.

(Image: DIGITAL/EROTEME.CO.UK)

The LA night sky lit up with flashes of colour for the seven-year-old, who Kim described as her "everything".

Although her birthday may have been in lockdown, North was still able to celebrate with her best friend, cousin and partner in crime, Penelope Disick, seven.

Taking to Instagram, Kourtney Kardashian shared a gorgeous tribute to her eldest niece with a sweet snap of the two kids enjoying the colourful day.

(Image: Instagram) (Image: BACKGRID)

North and Penelope pranced and danced around the Wyoming ranch together in the wholesome family snapshot.

Alongside the precious post, Kourt wrote: "My Northie birthday girl".

It comes after Kim treated her fans to an inside glimpse of life at home with North.

Captioning the series of snaps of her stylish daughter, Kim wrote: "Happy 7th Birthday to my first born baby North!

"I can’t believe you are 7. Crazy how time has flown by so fast like this! You are everything and more than I ever dreamed of!

"The most stylist creative Gemini performer ever! I love you to your alien planet and back!"

(Image: Kim Kardashian/Instagram)

North, who is also known as Nori to friends and family has grown up in the spotlight with her birth being documented on Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

The seven-year-old has been noted as 'the best big sister' by her rapper dad Kanye West and due to her performative ways, there's no doubt that North will grow up to shine in the limelight just like her celebrity parents.
